meanings.definition: Of or relating to athletes or athletics.
meanings.sent1: She admired the athletic abilities of the soccer players.
meanings.sent2: The Olympic Games showcase many athletic events.
meanings.sent3: The athletic competition was fierce but friendly.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to training made her an athletic force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of an athletic mindset in sports.

meanings.sent1: He maintained an athletic physique through regular exercise.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber was known for her athletic prowess.
meanings.sent3: The athletic cat effortlessly leaped from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: His athletic build helped him excel in physical challenges.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's athletic stamina impressed the crowd.

meanings.definition: Engaging in physical activities or sports.
meanings.sent1: The children had a fun and athletic day at the park.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed leading an athletic lifestyle filled with movement.
meanings.sent3: The athletic group organized a charity run for a good cause.
meanings.sent4: His love for athletic pursuits kept him active and healthy.
meanings.sent5: The community center offered various athletic programs for all ages.
